smg.text: Slight flooding may occur in Inner Harbour area from 6 ~ 9 pm due to astronomical tide. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds, becoming force 5 to 6 northerly winds with gusts.
Temperature falling. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 4 to 5 northerly winds, occasionally force 6 with gusts.
Cold and dry. Fine. Force 3 to 5 northeasterly winds with gusts.
Cold and dry. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 2 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Cold and dry. Fine. Force 2 to 3 northerly winds, becoming force 4 to 5 with gusts.
Cold and very dry. Fine. Force 3 to 5 northerly winds with gusts.
Cold and very dry. Fine. Force 3 to 4 northerly winds.
